pr_title: timetracking: add configuration for displaying time in 12 hour format

timeline.bodyText: A better name would be Time format
timeline.author: Adam-
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -39,14 +39,14 @@
 	String STOPWATCHES = "stopwatches";
 
 	@ConfigItem(
-		keyName = "estimateRelative",
-		name = "Show relative time",
-		description = "Show amount of time remaining instead of completion time",
+		keyName = "timeFormatMode",
+		name = "Display time as",

replies.bodyText: That's much better. Honestly had no idea what to call this.
replies.author: Hydrox6

timeline.message: timetracking: add configuration for displaying time in 12 hour format
timetracking: add configuration for displaying time in 12 hour format
